name: jasper-cli
postCreateCommand: cd jasper && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd .. && echo '#!/bin/bash\nexport PYTHONPATH=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)\npython -m jasper.jasper "$@"' | sudo tee /usr/local/bin/jasper > /dev/null && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/jasper
